title: Zarif: Iran still pursuing Hajj tragedy (Ministry of Foreign Affairs of IR of Iran)
text: ( Source : Ministry of Foreign Affairs of IR of Iran ) Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif said Iran was still pursuing the Hajj tragedy during which hundreds of Iranian pilgrims lost their lives. Talking to reporters at the sideline of the
